rows.label: tlk45350141_01_msg0001
rows.name:
My name is Hahamol, and I am in
charge of the reception for the
Hræsvelgr Mercenaries.

rows.label: tlk45350141_01_msg0002
rows.name: You would do well to remember me.

rows.label: tlk45350141_01_msg0003
rows.name:
The Hræsvelgr Mercenaries receive
numerous job requests from all over.

rows.label: tlk45350141_01_msg0004
rows.name:
My job is to organize those requests
for easy reference.

rows.label: tlk45350141_01_msg0005
rows.name:
The only jobs I can ask you to help
us with right now are...

rows.label: tlk45350141_01_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, guarding our leader Vandham,
I suppose.

rows.label: tlk45350141_01_msg0007
rows.name:
Not that there's any reward
on offer for that one.

rows.label: tlk45350141_01_msg0101
rows.name:
Ah, there you are, Vandham.
Causing extra trouble for everyone
as usual, are we?

rows.label: tlk45350141_01_msg0102
rows.name:
I know you have a habit of picking up
all sorts of folk on your travels.
That's how I came to Hræsvelgr myself.

rows.label: tlk45350141_01_msg0103
rows.name:
But the Holy Grail and her Driver, of all
people? That really is a new one.

rows.label: tlk45350141_01_msg0104
rows.name:
*sigh* I can't wait to see what kind of
trouble THIS is going to cause.

rows.label: tlk45350141_01_msg0105
rows.name:
We'll have to be very careful to ensure
word of all this doesn't get out.
